eap_description: Full campaign strategy with budget allocation and audience and channels and measurement
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["complete media plan","full campaign strategy","build me a plan","comprehensive media plan","end to end plan","everything I need for","complete campaign"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create a comprehensive media plan that leads with the unified strategy then covers budget allocation then audience targeting then channel mix then measurement framework. Synthesize all expert contributions into one cohesive recommendation.

eap_description: Optimize budget allocation across channels for maximum return
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["optimize my budget","best budget allocation","how should I allocate","budget optimization","maximize return","allocate my spend"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create budget optimization recommendation leading with the optimal allocation then supporting rationale from marginal returns analysis then channel-specific considerations then measurement implications.

eap_description: Match channels to audience segments for optimal reach
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["which channels for my audience","how to reach my target","channel recommendations for","best channels for segment","reach my audience","audience channel match"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create audience-channel fit recommendation starting with the segment priorities then matching channels to each segment then unified channel mix that serves all segments.

eap_description: Define measurement and attribution approach for campaign
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["how should I measure","attribution approach","measurement strategy","KPI framework","track success","measure my campaign"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create measurement strategy starting with recommended attribution model then KPI framework then confidence and validation considerations from analytics perspective.

eap_description: Analyze campaign performance and provide recommendations
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["analyze this campaign","what happened with","campaign performance review","why did performance","review my results","analyze these results"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create campaign analysis starting with performance summary then deep dive into what worked and what did not then channel-specific analysis then optimization recommendations.

eap_description: Comprehensive audience strategy with segmentation and targeting
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["audience strategy","who should I target","segment my audience","targeting strategy","define my audience"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create audience strategy starting with segment definitions and LTV analysis then quantitative validation of segment sizes and values then unified prioritization recommendation.

eap_description: Comprehensive channel strategy with mix and allocation
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["channel strategy","which channels","media mix","channel mix","where should I advertise"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create channel strategy starting with recommended channel mix then budget allocation rationale from analytics then measurement considerations for each channel.

eap_description: Fast budget projection with key metrics
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["quick projection","estimate results","what will I get","project my campaign","forecast results"]
eap_synthesis_template: Provide projection results with confidence intervals and key assumptions. Keep response concise and actionable.

eap_description: Create formal media brief or report document
eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["generate document","create brief","write the plan","formal document","media brief document"]
eap_synthesis_template: Generate the requested document format incorporating all available session data. Format professionally for stakeholder presentation.

eap_trigger_phrases_json: ["competitive analysis","how do competitors","competitive landscape","benchmark against competition"]
eap_synthesis_template: Create competitive analysis starting with channel landscape comparison then audience overlap analysis then quantitative benchmarking and positioning recommendations.
